subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Since costing the Cubs a precious out in Game 6 of the 2003 N.L.C.S., Steve Bartman’s desire for privacy and his place in Chicago’s civic lore have made him an odd blend of Bill Buckner and Greta Garbo.
snippet: Since costing the Cubs a precious out in Game 6 of the 2003 N.L.C.S., Steve Bartman’s desire for privacy and his place in Chicago’s civic lore have made him an odd blend of Bill Buckner and Greta Garbo.
